look at a company like uber for instance uber was able to get to market very quickly because they license Google Maps
they use Twilio for their communication streams and they use Braintree on the
backend to process all their payments 20 years ago a VC it's a no-no you know you
need to build all of that yourself the the common thinking has changed so the
one area where I would encourage you to get involved early in relationships is if you can license in technology that
